replies.body:
*charges into 1v5*
*dies*
"Group!"

As a Bronze III nuub, I approve this message. 

You just forgot one thing.
"Wtf. Y u guyz no halp??"
"i almost had the penta"-yasuo 2016

I believe it is
"Don't finish , go to BARON!!"
It's actually "Don't finish, farm bot!"
and wolf camp. Must do wolf camp first.
Oh and don't forget the ScuttleCrab too

Except for top bronzies.  
They say "SHUT UP GUYS I NEED TO FARM"
What? I don't farm, I just own the lane and help my team.
GROUP MID (EVEN THOUGH WE ARE 10/64) WE HAVE GOOD TEAM FIGHT!

^^ This 

And they are like:

"GG 10/10!
 would do it again!"

"Report my support they didn't help me 1v5"
Vayne players, gotta love 'em
nice meme

{{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:133}}  {{champion:10}} "group mid"
{{champion:12}} :(
Shouldnt Susan be the sad one?

Their entire team is a comp full of splitpushing champions. 

I'm guessing they say "group mid" and then just go afk farm the jungle (Jax), push bot (Quinn) push top (Nasus) and waveclear mid (Kayle). Ali then becomes confused and dies from milk seeping into his brain.
Lately it's been my experience that it's the Support that wants to split push while the rest of the team groups. Interestingly enough one of these recent split-pushing-supports was an Alistar.

http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/105/0/7/wonka_thresh_blank_by_artsed-d61v5ys.jpg
ever heard of full ap and or full ad thresh prince of stealing your wives
also thresh's in bronze and gold:JUST GRAB THE LANTERN

Accurate, but it's primarily because they just run all over the place like a youth soccer match. 

if you look at the map and you've got 1 in each lane, 1 in base, and 1 at crows, you'd say "group mid" too
{{champion:59}} Stand with me brothers and sisters!!!

"OMG tank why you not with us?!"

"I was dead."
A Lee-Sin yesterday in one of my games. Complains: "Bot lane 1-4", then proceeds to turret dive their bot lane 1.5mins later.
What is "Bronze"?

"I dont need smite to jungle Sona"

Alternatively; just jungle Sona.
This is uncannily accurate
As a bronze player i agree.

No no no no no...

"REPORT JG, GG"
